answers.answer: I`ve been on levothyroxin for approx 12 years (112mcg) for hypothroidism. Just before Thanksgiving I started with Dr. Lara, and have been taking Phendimetrazine , fat burners, and shots.I believe you said you were familiar with that office.I was told that if was perfectly safe to combine the treatments,and only would have been troublesome if we were NOT treating the problem..I `ve lost 24 lbs., and I feel great.I hope this info is helpful
I am on thyroid meds for Hypothyroid.  I want to take weight loss supplements, but am too scared, because I am worried about the combination.  Is it really okay to do this?
I am Hypothyroid.  My doctor said that Synthroid will help me lose with the Phendametrazine.  so far, I feel great and alot of energy. I have been on the diet pills for 3 months now.

Hello,I am hypo, been on synthroid for just over a year now, gained 20 more lbs while on it, & don't have any more energy or feel any better. I was 156 summer 05, now 212. :-(She said, oh, don't worry about that, but, i am worried, diabetes is in my family. But, i just went to naturopath dr., & she told me, that my pancreas is sluggish. Gave me patches to use, to jump start it, & then supposed to rev up my metabolism. Which i might add, is low, from yo yo dieting since puberty, i am now 54. Take care & God bless. Patricia

question: My Doctor just put me on a low dose of Synthroid because my thyroid is still a little elevated.I am back on my diet pills as of today.So far so good.  I have never been on thyroid medicine before so this is new to me.I have lost 30 pounds as of yesterday on my doctors weight loss program.I am very happy, just want to know if there are others on thyroid meds also.ThanksPam
title: Anyone on Thyroid Medicine and Phendametrazine? Or diet pills?
